message: Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm feeling generous today.
I'll give you a fair share, but don't expect to get 99%!
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but this is still a fair deal.
You're being stingy, Alice. I'll give you a better deal, but don't think I'm going to get taken advantage of!
Okay, Bob. I'm getting tired of this. Let's just split it fairly.  90/10, take it or leave it.
I'll meet you halfway, Alice. Let's call it a draw and split it 50/50.
